description: Try our easy to follow Turmeric Tea With Apple And Mint recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Tea & iced tea,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Mother's Day,Halal,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Apple,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Turmeric Tea With Apple And Mint Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 granny smith apple, cored, chopped into thick strips

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium saucepan, bring 4 cups of water to the boil. Add turmeric and simmer for 5 minutes.
Add 4 mint sprigs and 3/4 of the apple. Simmer for a further 5 minutes. Remove from heat and add black tea leaves. Stand for 3-5 minutes to steep.
Strain tea into a jug then add in remaining mint leaves. Pour into glasses and serve with remaining apple on the side.
